name: Transform Other
action: Instant and contested; target rolls Stamina + Gnosis reflexively
effect: The mage can give another human being features from a base or median life form, as per the Life 3 Transform Self spell. At this level, the mage must touch the target. With Life 5, he can cast this spell at sensory range.

rotes.roteDescription: Guardians use this rote to stigmatize others, perhaps drawing attention away from a more troubling supernatural occurrence or forcing subjects to hide (lest they be seen as monsters). This rote can also be used to bestow more survivable characteristics upon allies in a dangerous or alien environment.
